message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase a high-value item. I believe it's worth considering at a price of $850000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. After considering your offer, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $775000. This is a fair price considering the value it brings. What do you think?

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to go up to $750000, but that's my final offer. I really think that's a fair price for this product.

I understand you're close to your budget, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise further, but I need to be at least $2000 above your last offer. I'm now offering the product to you for $782000. This is my final counteroffer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand you need to make a profit, but I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to go up to $760000, but that's as high as I can go. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and the negotiations we've had so far.
